titleStmt.title: The braue English iipsie. To the tune of The Spanish ipsie [sic].

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Trundle, at his shop neere the Hospitall Gate in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere the Hospitall Gate in Smithfield
